name: NYCALOTH

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.text: If the nycaloth dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Gehenna.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The nycaloth has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The nycaloth makes two Mercurial Axe attacks.

actions.name: Mercurial Axe
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. Hit or Miss: The axe magically returns to the nycaloth's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

bonus_actions.name: Shadowy Teleport
bonus_actions.text: The nycaloth has the Invisible condition for 1 minute, and it teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The condition ends early immediately after it deals damage.
